p: Quercetin ( 8) is an aglycone present at high concentration in onions. This compound has virucidal activity against enveloped viruses such as mengovirus, herpes simplex, parainfluenza type 3, pseudorabies, respiratory syncytial, and Sindbis viruses (Choi et al. 2009). Quercetin is able to inhibit H +-ATPase of lysosomal membrane and thus prevents virus coat removal and blocks viral replication and competitively inhibits SARS-CoV 3CL pro with IC 50 of 42.79 ± 4.97 μM (Chen et al. 2006).
